amendment.description: Amendment allocates $10 million in funding to be available for the VA Home Telehealth Progam.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce, then increase funding for Veterans Health Administration Medical Expenses by $10,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lujan Grisham (NM) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Lujan Grisham (NM).
